A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: He literally tossed his saber over his head. Think about how the culmination of VII was Rey epically handing Master Luke his father Anakin's saber... and then VIII happens and we get a damn sitcom laugh track of Luke launching this precious relic over his shoulder irreverently. That scene captures this whole movie. They traded the history\, character\, and value of an incredible\, high-fantasy space opera\, for a laugh track and Star Wars bed sheets on sale at Target. Such a travesty.
